name: part_009
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠】さくらみこ1st Live ＂flower fantasista!＂【#咲き誇るみこち】 [mVmWmkHltak]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Sakura Miko performs her song 'flower fantasista!' live on stage with dynamic dancing and on-screen lyrics.
A brief transition with applause and music before the next song begins.
Sakura Miko performs a high-energy chant-based song, announcing a costume change.
Closing title card with thank you messages and event information for the 'flower fantasista!' live concert.

subtitles.original: 笑顔が足りてないね
subtitles.english: You don't have enough smiles, do you?

subtitles.original: 大大大大好きじゃ済まさない　いいじゃんね
subtitles.english: Just "love, love, love, love" isn't enough, it's fine, right?

subtitles.original: 大大大満足のその上の感動を
subtitles.english: An emotion beyond just "satisfaction, satisfaction, satisfaction"

subtitles.original: もっと欲しがっちゃって　ほかに贅沢にいこう
subtitles.english: Want it even more, let's go for even more luxury

subtitles.original: 全然前進したいって凹んじゃったって
subtitles.english: Even if I get depressed wanting to move forward at all

subtitles.original: ならば全身全霊人生最大の全力で
subtitles.english: Then, with my whole heart and soul, the greatest effort of my life

subtitles.original: La pa pa 三拍子に息を合わせて進め Peace Sign
subtitles.english: La pa pa, breathe in time with the triple meter and move forward, Peace Sign

subtitles.original: Wow Wow Wow
subtitles.english: Wow Wow Wow

subtitles.original: 乗り遅れんなよ　みんな！
subtitles.english: Don't be left behind, everyone!

subtitles.original: Wow Wow Wow
subtitles.english: Wow Wow Wow

subtitles.original: 声聴かせて！
subtitles.english: Let me hear your voices!

subtitles.original: Wow Wow Wow
subtitles.english: Wow Wow Wow

subtitles.original: 歌声高らかに
subtitles.english: Sing out loud and clear

subtitles.original: ベイベイベイなんてさ　なんだかちょっと言い表せない
subtitles.english: Bay-bay-bay, it's like, I can't quite put it into words

subtitles.original: 独りぼっちで見合てた光景は
subtitles.english: The scenery I looked at all by myself

subtitles.original: 今はきっとあなたと冒険してる
subtitles.english: Is surely an adventure with you now

subtitles.original: 大大大大大大大大
subtitles.english: Big big big big big big big big big

subtitles.original: 大大大大好きじゃ収まらない
subtitles.english: Just "love, love, love, love" won't fit

subtitles.original: だから最大レベルにガチの全力で
subtitles.english: So, with serious full power at the maximum level

subtitles.original: La pa pa 踊っちゃおうぜ　ずっと大冒険
subtitles.english: La pa pa, let's dance, it's a big adventure forever

subtitles.original: Peace Sign
subtitles.english: Peace Sign

subtitles.original: 大大大問題も吹き飛ばせ
subtitles.english: Blow away even "big, big, big" problems

subtitles.original: いつの日か大大大団円の素敵な結末へ
subtitles.english: Someday, to a wonderful grand finale ending

subtitles.original: Follow me 付いてきて　進め　前代未聞　ニューワールド
subtitles.english: Follow me, come with me, advance to an unprecedented new world

subtitles.original: 刮目しててくれ Peace Sign
subtitles.english: Keep your eyes on me, Peace Sign

subtitles.original: Flower Fantasista!
subtitles.english: Flower Fantasista!

subtitles.original: 咲き誇るぜ　ベイベー！
subtitles.english: I'll bloom in full glory, baby!

subtitles.original: Oh!
subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: Ah!
subtitles.english: Ah!

subtitles.original: 行くにぇ！
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: キュンキュンみこキュン　キュンキュンみこキュン
subtitles.english: Kyun kyun Miko Kyun, Kyun kyun Miko Kyun

subtitles.original: キュンキュンみこキュン　キュンキュンみこキュン
subtitles.english: Kyun kyun Miko Kyun, Kyun kyun Miko Kyun

subtitles.original: キュンキュンみこキュン　キュンキュンみこキュン
subtitles.english: Kyun kyun Miko Kyun, Kyun kyun Miko Kyun

subtitles.original: キュンキュンみこキュン　キュンキュンみこキュン
subtitles.english: Kyun kyun Miko Kyun, Kyun kyun Miko Kyun

subtitles.original: 君にみこキュン
subtitles.english: Miko Kyun for you

subtitles.original: 衣装チェンジだにぇ！
subtitles.english: It's a costume change!

subtitles.original: みんな、キュンキュンしてにぇ！
subtitles.english: Everyone, please feel the "kyun"!

subtitles.original: 行くぞー！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: 無料パートは終了いたしました。ご視聴ありがとうございました！
